column6: "A CAUTIONARY TALE" In this standalone story, everything you thought you knew about the enigmatic Dark Avenger Daken gets turned upside-down.  Moonstone lets her curiosity-and her training as a doctor of psychology-get the better of her as she attempts to uncover what lies beneath Daken's surface.  But when she finally gets him alone, what she finds just might kill her. A perfect place to jump on board to find out why critics are calling this series  "a must read"! Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Giuseppe Camuncoli | writer:Marjorie Liu | writer:Daniel Way | colorist:Brandon Peterson | letterer:Cory Petit
